title: Domino's Pizza Germany
description: Want a Domino’s store anywhere, anytime? Now you can with the Domino’s app!Features: -	Order in just 2 taps on your Android Smart Watch when reordering one of your favourite Quick Orders -	Order in as little as 4 clicks with Quick Order-	Save a Fast Favourite Quick Order for faster ordering-	Receive Live Pizza Tracker push notifications on the progress of your order directly to your Android device-	Build a better pizza using Domino’s Pizza Chef®-	Order your favourite pizzas, sides and desserts from the easy to navigate menu-	Check out quickly and easily with the PayPal payment option* The pricing may vary from the actual pricing in the screenshots.
descriptionHTML:
Want a Domino’s store anywhere, anytime? Now you can with the Domino’s app!

Features:
- Order in just 2 taps on your Android Smart Watch when reordering one of your favourite Quick Orders
- Order in as little as 4 clicks with Quick Order
- Save a Fast Favourite Quick Order for faster ordering
- Receive Live Pizza Tracker push notifications on the progress of your order directly to your Android device
- Build a better pizza using Domino’s Pizza Chef®
- Order your favourite pizzas, sides and desserts from the easy to navigate menu
- Check out quickly and easily with the PayPal payment option
* The pricing may vary from the actual pricing in the screenshots.
comments: Cant find/recognise my address even though i live in central Berlin
Takes for ever to load anything, stops working completely midway, does not recognize input correctly

Die App ist funktional. Es fehlt aber ein Textfeld für Lieferanweisungen. Gerade Leute, die aus Institutionen (Arbeit, Krankenhaus, etc.) bestellen, brauchen diese option zur Spezifizierung über die Adresse hinaus.
Did what i needed it to do.
